title: Features Response Object
description: An object containing an attribute for each enabled feature.

dayReferenceImage.description: A `links` object containing a single `http://calipsa.io/relation/current-image` attribute, which is the individual link object specifying the location of the reference image. This link object contains an `href` attribute, which is a link to the view's day reference image, and a `meta` atrribute, which is an object containing the `lastUpdatedAt` date-time attribute, indicating when the image was last updated. If there is no day reference image associated with this view, the `dayReferenceImage` object will not be present.

nightReferenceImage.description: A `links` object containing a single `http://calipsa.io/relation/current-image` attribute, which is the individual link object specifying the location of the reference image. This link object contains an `href` attribute, which is a link to the view's night reference image, and a `meta` atrribute, which is an object containing the `lastUpdatedAt` date-time attribute, indicating when the image was last updated. If there is no day reference image associated with this view, the `dayReferenceImage` object will not be present.

humanDetection.description: Whether human detection is enabled for the object detection feature.

vehicleDetection.description: Whether vehicle detection is enabled for the object detection feature.

retentionTier.description: This indicates how long in days the forensic search system will retain data before it becomes inaccessible.

advancedRules.description: Advanced rule configuration for the advanced detection feature.
